item.title: .@cvpayne is spot on here! Companies pandering to the Marxist left will make conservatism taboo for employees. @JV3MRC
item.description: As corporate America continues to pander to violent left-wing mobs, Fox Business’s Charles Payne expressed major concern about what this trend could mean for conservatives in the workplace.
item.dc:creator: Joseph Vazquez

item.title: .@Facebook @finkd Caves to Liberal Pressure and Agrees to Censor @realDonaldTrump via @descarteslover
item.description: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg once said, “I don’t think it’s right for a private company to censor politicians or the news in a democracy.” The sentiment seemed to vanish after a slew of ad boycotts and hit pieces in the liberal media.
item.dc:creator: Corinne Weaver

item.title: President @realDonaldTrump Expects Twitter Ban, Calls for Big Tech Reform via @AlaxandairH
item.description: As the Trump administration initiates war on Big Tech censorship, President Donald Trump suspects that Silicon Valley liberals will use every dirty trick they can come up with, including censoring him.
item.dc:creator: Alexander Hall

item.title: .@Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg Declares Platform Will Expand ‘Hateful Content’ Policy in Ads
item.description: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg caved to internal and external pressure and once again changed Facebook policies. He declared his platform will be “adopting some new policies to prohibit a wider category of hateful content in ads.”
item.dc:creator: Alexander Hall

item.title: Lawmakers' Proposed Section 230 Legislation Must Address 4 Key Issues
item.description: Imagine a groan-inducing trip to the Department of Motor Vehicles, but for social media censorship. Such is the Platform Accountability and Consumer Transparency (PACT) Act.
item.dc:creator: Alexander Hall

item.title: Okay @Amazon @JeffBezos, renaming KeyArena the "Climate Pledge Arena" is one of the dumbest ideas of 2020. via @JV3MRC
item.description: It’s not enough for the leftist climate activist elites to promote their climate agenda in Big Tech company policies alone. Now Amazon has decided to infuse its climate agenda into the naming of a stadium to shove it into sports fans’ faces.
item.dc:creator: Joseph Vazquez

item.title: Christian Worship Leader @seanfeucht Says It’s ‘Time to Fight Back’ Against Big Tech, Promote Free Speech
item.description: Instagram has reportedly censored users from sharing a video by Christian missionary and Bethel Music artist Sean Feucht. The artist said the platform is “classifying my WORSHIP videos as ‘harmful or false information.’”
item.dc:creator: Alexander Hall

item.title: CENSORED: Twitter Permanently Suspends Pro-Trump Meme Creator Carpe Donktum
item.description: Twitter has continued its unabashed attacks on President Donald Trump and his allies by permanently suspending well-known, pro-Trump meme creator Carpe Donktum.
item.dc:creator: Alexander Hall

item.title: Check out the list of @PaulKrugman's Top Ten WORST Tweets of 2020....so far. via @JV3MRC
item.description: If you think New York Times economist Paul Krugman’s op-eds are bad, his Twitter account is even worse. It’s a collection of babble, not the commentary of a Nobel laureate.
item.dc:creator: Joseph Vazquez

item.title: @Twitter censors @RealDonaldTrump tweet, claiming 'abusive behavior' for wanting to enforce the law. #censorship
item.description: Twitter is at it again. The social media site censored President Donald Trump’s response to raging protests just outside the White House. Trump warned the attempt to turn historic St. John’s Episcopal Church into a “Black House Autonomous Zone” would be “met with serious force.”
item.dc:creator: Heather Moon
